title: Virtualized Network Service Proxy VM
description: Configuration for Nuage VNS Proxy VM.

mgmt_ip.title: Management IP address
mgmt_ip.description: IP address of the management interface

mgmt_ip_prefix.title: Management IP Prefix Length
mgmt_ip_prefix.description: IP Prefix length for the management network

mgmt_gateway.title: Management Gateway IP
mgmt_gateway.description: IP address of the gateway on the management network

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the Virtual Machine on the Hypervisor

target_server_type.title: Target Server Type
target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment into which the instance will be created

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Bridge interface
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface of a component or the BOF interface on the VM. This will be a Distributed Virtual PortGroup (DVPG) when deploying on vCenter or a Linux network bridge (ex: br0) when deploying on KVM. This field takes precedence over the value defined in the Commons section

data_subnet.title: Data Subnet
data_subnet.description: Only required for DHCP bootstrap support

nsgv_gateway.title: Gateway address for NSGvs
nsgv_gateway.description: Gateway address to be provided by DHCP for NSGvs.

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter Name
vcenter_datacenter.description: Name of the vCenter Datacenter on which the Proxy/Util VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datacenter Name if not defined here.

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster Name
vcenter_cluster.description: Name of the vCenter Cluster on which the Proxy/Util VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Cluster Name if not defined here.

vcenter_host_reference.title: vCenter Host Reference
vcenter_host_reference.description: Requires ovftool 4.3. Reference to the host on the vCenter cluster on which to deploy Nuage components

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore Name
vcenter_datastore.description: Name of the vCenter Datastore on which the Proxy/Util VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datastore Name if not defined here.

aws_instance_type.title: AWS Instance Type
aws_instance_type.description: Instance Type of the AWS Instance

aws_key_name.title: AWS Keypair Name
aws_key_name.description: Name of the Keypair used to connect to VPC

aws_mgmt_eni.title: AWS Management ENI ID
aws_mgmt_eni.description: ENI ID for VNSUTIL Instance on Management Subnetwork

aws_data_eni.title: AWS Data ENI ID
aws_data_eni.description: ENI ID for VNSUTIL on Data Interface
